meanings.definition: To undergo the process of becoming a rock.
meanings.sent1: The sediment slowly lithified over millions of years, forming layers of rock.
meanings.sent2: Fossils can lithify over time, preserving the remains of ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate bar left in the sun began to lithify, much to the disappointment of its owner.
meanings.sent4: His memories seemed to lithify in his mind, becoming more solid and unchanging with time.
